values: 工作；职业；作品；著作；成果；成就；制品；手工艺品；机械装置；运作机制；（机器等的）活动部件；防御工事；工程；（物理学中的）功；努力；职责；工作内容；活计；工厂；作业；操作；全套事物
工作；使工作；从事…工作；干活；开动；操作（机器、装置等）；运作；运转；起作用；有效果；发挥功效；加工；处理；塑造；（逐渐地）移动；缓慢前进；激励；促进；挖掘；开采；解决；克服；经营；管理；塑造（艺术品）；创作（文学作品）；引起；激发；刺激；渗透；奏效；使奏效
工作的；为工作的；工作用的

synonym.mean: 工作；功；产品；操作；职业；行为；工厂；文学、音乐或艺术作品
使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 专心工作的人；醉心于工作的人；为免遭辞退而工作过份卖力的人
工作；影响；受雇用（work的ing形式）
切实可行的；可经营的；能工作的
日常的，工作日的；平凡的
工作日的；日常的；普通的，平凡的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指任何种类的工作，也泛指职业。
较正式用词，语气庄重，指长期从事，但不一定以此为主计的职业。
泛指任何一种职业，既不分什么行业，也不管是脑力还是体力劳动。
指受雇于他人，领取工资以谋生计，有较固定工作的职业。
指需要有熟练技巧、技能和体力的职业。
以前常指要受过高等教育(尤指法律、医学和神学)才能获得的职业，现在一般指为谋生日的职业，尤指从事脑力劳动和受过专门训练，具有某种专业知识的职业。
指经过专门训练，终身愿意从事的职业。
通常指一切有收入，不分脑力与体力运动，不论是否有技艺的长期或临时的职业。
最普通用词，含义广，指人们日常生活和工作中所从事的有目的的体力或脑力劳动。
通常指分派给的任务，也指自愿的工作，但往往是艰巨或令人厌烦的工作。
多用于口语，侧重指受雇用的，以谋生为目的工作，不论有无技术，也不管是零工或散工。

word_group.brief_definition: 在工作, 在干活, 在活动；在运转
解出, 算出；产生结果, 发展, 成功；锻炼；训练
人多好办事, 众人拾柴火焰高
艺术品, (绘画、雕塑等)艺术作品；精品, 赏心悦目的事物
工作效率；办公效率；劳动效率
日常工作；每日工作；每天的工作

list.abstract: 《Work》是巴巴多斯流行女歌手蕾哈娜演唱的歌曲，与加拿大说唱歌手德雷克合作，收录于蕾哈娜第八张录音室专辑《Anti》，并作为专辑的首支单曲发行于2016年1月27日。是Rihanna的第14首公告牌冠军单曲。

yingyinNormal.en: So, how was work today?
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天工作如何？

yingyinNormal.en: Your work makes me sad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的工作让我觉得好悲惨。

yingyinNormal.en: You work hard, you pay your taxes…
yingyinNormal.zh: 工作努力，交税…

yingyinNormal.en: Who do you work for, me or her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为我还是为她工作？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, I was thinking about work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起，我在想工作的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Please don't make us talk about work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以也求求你别让我们谈工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey! Leonard, where are you? I'm at work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你在哪呢？我在工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if you want, you can work here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你愿意的话，你可以来这里工作。

yingyinNormal.en: How was your vacation? Ready to go to work?
yingyinNormal.zh: 假度得怎么样？准备工作了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Rabbit and Ms. Cat work with Daddy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸和兔先生猫女士一起工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Rabbit and Ms. Cat work with Daddy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸和兔先生猫女士一起工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Pretty soon you're all going to join the work force.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很快你们就会参加工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my ankle. I can still hop to work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，我的脚踝。我仍然可以单足跳着去工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me. I've got a lot of work to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是不好意思啊，我还有很多工作要做呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Professional employment? Fast food work? Temping, like Maggie? Any employment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 与专业对口的工作？还是在快餐店打工？像玛姬那样的临时工？任何工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Well no it doesn't matter, we'll be at work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系的，反正我们到时候也是在工作的。

yingyinNormal.en: I love birthday parties. You work for Wallace?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢生日聚会。你为华莱士公司工作？

yingyinNormal.en: Canada. I have some opportunities for work in Winnipeg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加拿大，我在温尼伯有个工作机会。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, I understand, I mean a monkey's gotta work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会，我理解，我是说，猴子得工作嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Poor Daddy, having to go to work. Oh, poor Daddy!
yingyinNormal.zh: 可怜的爸爸，必须得去工作。噢，可怜的爸爸！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Your boss proposes a new initiative you think won't <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的老板提出了一个你认为行不通的新计划。

examination_example.sentence: Jokes that <highlight>work</highlight> on one person won't necessarily land with another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对一个人有效的笑话不一定会对另一个人起作用。

examination_example.sentence: He analyzes the weak lecture, learning lessons for the future about what <highlight>works</highlight> and what doesn't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他分析了这次糟糕的演讲，哪些有效，哪些无效，为将来吸取教训。

sense_info_list.en: something created as a result of effort, especially a painting, book, or piece of music

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Work</highlight> by Tina Malti, a psychology professor at the University of Toronto, suggests that guilt may compensate for an emotional deficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多伦多大学心理学教授Tina Malti的研究表明，内疚可能会弥补情感上的不足。

examination_example.sentence: The potential of this <highlight>work</highlight> applied to healthcare is very great.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项工作应用于医疗保健的潜力非常大。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes I feel in his late <highlight>works</highlight> a will to break all signs of continuity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他晚年的作品中，我有时会感受到一种想要打破所有连贯性迹象的意愿。

sense_info_list.zh: 工作; 努力; 劳动

examination_example.sentence: And today, even writers who are fairly well-known often have to do other <highlight>work</highlight> to supplement their writing income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而今天，即使是相当有名气的作家，也经常要做其他工作来贴补写作收入。

examination_example.sentence: The value of <highlight>work</highlight> is also driving folks to continue working past retirement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作的价值也驱使人们在退休后继续工作。

examination_example.sentence: Furthermore, Scovell's story involved much more than just intelligence <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，斯科维尔的故事不仅仅涉及情报工作。

examination_example.sentence: Yet the new system has not yet <highlight>worked</highlight> out any cheaper for the universities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，新制度还没有产生任何让大学花钱更少的结果。

examination_example.sentence: Clearly you try to comprehend, in the sense of identifying meanings for individual words and <highlight>working</highlight> out relationships between them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 显然，你试图通过确定每个单词的含义并弄清词与词之间的关系来理解。

examination_example.sentence: After all, it has an ad business too, which it says will comply with DNT requests, though it is still <highlight>working</highlight> out how.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕竟，它（微软公司）也有广告业务。它表示将遵守DNT的要求，尽管它仍在研究该如何做到这一点。

examination_example.sentence: Gates chooses nonfiction titles because they explain how the world <highlight>works</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 盖茨之所以选择非小说类书名的读物，是因为它们解释了世界是如何运转的。

examination_example.sentence: That misses the way the surveillance economy <highlight>works</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这忽略了财政监督的运作方式。

examination_example.sentence: And new research suggests that happiness might influence how firms <highlight>work</highlight>, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新的研究表明，幸福感也可能影响公司的运作方式。

examination_example.sentence: I'm experiencing increased zeal for <highlight>working</highlight> out since I no longer carry the burden of a disappointing morning weigh-in.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对锻炼的热情越来越高，因为我不再背负着一个令人失望的早晨称重的负担。

sense_info_list.zh: 加工; 揉合; 搅拌

sense_info_list.en: the parts of a machine, especially those that move

sense_info_list.zh: 缓慢行进; 费力移动

sense_info_list.en: bring into a specified emotional state

word_usage.usage: work指“工作、劳动、作业”时，为不可数名词，而指“著作、作品”时，是可数名词且多用复数形式works。
均指“工作”时，work既可指体力劳动也可指脑力劳动，通常都以挣钱为目的，有时也指机器干的工作。job多用于口语，侧重指受雇用的、以谋生为目的的工作。profession指需要专门技能（尤其是较高教育水平）的职业、专业。career指从事的职业或希望毕生从事的事业。
动词 work 用于进行时和一般时时意义不同。用于进行时表示工作是临时性的，例如，I'm working in London (我目前在伦敦工作)暗示这种情形是暂时的。用于一般时则表示工作是固定的，例如，I work in London (我在伦敦工作)，暗示伦敦是固定的工作地点。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“工作、事儿”，为不可数名词。
意为“职业、行业、专业”，正式用语。
意为“职业、岗位”，一般指某种特定工作。
意为“行当、行业、手艺”，尤指需要技术性劳动的工作。
意为“行业、（职业正规的）工作、（赖以为生的）正业”，尤指一个人特别适合或尤其有资格胜任的职业。
意为“生涯”，常指终身从事的工作或职业。
意为“职业、行业、专业”，正式用语，指受高等教育和特别训练的工作。
意为“工作、事儿”，可数名词。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He won an award from the US government for his <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的工作获得了美国政府的奖励。

examination_example.sentence: They often <highlight>work</highlight> without any pay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们经常无偿工作。

examination_example.sentence: What does the speaker say about <highlight>working</highlight> for a new venture?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 演讲者对为一家新企业工作怎么说？

examination_example.sentence: But those places that want them must be given the chance to make tourist taxes <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，那些想要获得旅游税的地方必须有机会让旅游税发挥作用。

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, it <highlight>works</highlight> best in conjunction with deep knowledge and expertise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，它与深厚的知识和专业技能相结合，效果最好。

examination_example.sentence: We mistakenly think of "good" drawings as those which <highlight>work</highlight> as recreations of the real world, as realistic illusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们错误地认为“好”的绘画是真实世界的再现，是现实的幻想。

examination_example.sentence: I felt too constrained <highlight>working</highlight> with the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得和过去打交道太受约束了。

examination_example.sentence: One such partnership is with Elvis & Kresse, an accessories brand <highlight>working</highlight> with reclaimed materials.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一个合作伙伴是Elvis & Kresse，一个使用再生材料的配件品牌。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Working</highlight> from available photographs is tricky.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据现有的照片工作是很棘手的。

sense_info_list.en: something created as a result of effort, especially a painting, book, or piece of music

examination_example.sentence: She is a critic of <highlight>works</highlight> on military affairs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她是军事著作的评论家。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays celebrities straightforwardly claim themselves to be the authors, even though all the <highlight>work</highlight> was done by other people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，名人直截了当地声称自己是作者，即使所有的作品都是由别人完成的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Works</highlight> of art that sustained smoke damage were being taken to the Louvre.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遭受烟雾破坏的艺术品被带到卢浮宫。

sense_info_list.zh: 工作材料; 工作成果

examination_example.sentence: Otherwise, the <highlight>work</highlight> becomes religion or faith.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则，工作成果就会变成宗教或信仰。

examination_example.sentence: We are <highlight>working</highlight> tirelessly to expand our solutions and would love to welcome anyone to our workshop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正在不知疲倦地努力发展我们的解决方案，并欢迎任何人来我们的车间。

examination_example.sentence: In contrast, the small cultivator is <highlight>working</highlight> only a few acres of land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相比之下，小耕农只耕种几英亩土地。

examination_example.sentence: It deterred luxury consumers who found their expensive clothing more closely associated with <highlight>working</highlight>-class youth culture than a prestigious heritage fashion house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让奢侈品消费者望而却步，他们发现自己的昂贵服装与工人阶级青年文化的联系比其与享有盛誉的传统时装屋更密切相关。

sense_info_list.en: a place where a person goes specially to do their job

word_usage.usage:
表示“努力工作”：
如果用名词work，要说hard work，这里的hard是形容词；
如果用动词work，要说work hard，这里的hard是副词。
表达“失业”用out of work，此处work前不可加定冠词the。同样，表达“有工作”用in work，中间也不加the。
work作“著作，作品”时，多用复数形式works。

艺术品；(绘画、雕塑等)艺术作品

examination_example.sentence: For commuting to <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了上下班工作。

examination_example.sentence: She might have to do extra <highlight>work</highlight> everyday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她可能每天都得加班工作。

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman like about doing one's <highlight>work</highlight> in a café?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个女人喜欢在咖啡馆里做什么工作？

examination_example.sentence: If this <highlight>works</highlight>, it won't matter if they can't remember what they ate yesterday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果这个方法起作用，即使他们不记得昨天吃了什么也没关系。

examination_example.sentence: The decoy effect <highlight>works</highlight> because of the way our brains assign value when making choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 诱饵效应之所以有效，是因为我们的大脑在做出选择时分配价值的方式。

examination_example.sentence: Some, like Mr. Azar's plastic bag, are open to argument as to how they <highlight>work</highlight>, or whether they really <highlight>work</highlight> at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些，比如阿扎尔的塑料袋，对它们是如何工作的，或者它们是否真的工作，存在很多争议。

examination_example.sentence: The system <highlight>works</highlight> like existing dockless bikeshare systems, where riders unlock bikes through a smartphone app.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该系统的工作原理类似于现有的无桩共享单车系统，骑手通过智能手机应用程序解锁自行车。

sense_info_list.en: something created as a result of effort; especially a painting; book; or piece of music

examination_example.sentence: Once he's all done, the <highlight>work</highlight> will remain there permanently.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦他完成了所有的工作，作品将永远留在那里。

examination_example.sentence: As for the Brazilian artist's <highlight>work</highlight>, the authorities were annoyed but could find nothing to charge him with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至于这位巴西艺术家的作品，当局很恼火，但找不到任何指控。

examination_example.sentence: It turns dirty walls into artistic <highlight>works</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它把肮脏的墙壁变成了艺术作品。

sense_info_list.en: the parts of a machine; especially those that move

examination_example.sentence: She was so scared that she would spend days <highlight>working</highlight> up the courage to walk to the supermarket for basic supplies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她非常害怕，以至于要花上几天的时间才鼓起勇气去超市买基本用品。

word_usage.usage: work作“著作，作品”时，多用复数形式works。
表达“失业”用out of work，此处work前不可加定冠词the。同样，表达“有工作”用in work，中间也不加the。

表示“努力工作”：
如果用名词work，要说hard work，这里的hard是形容词；
如果用动词work，要说work hard，这里的hard是副词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: My next <highlight>work</highlight> was to construct a nest and anchor it in a tree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的下一项工作是建造一个巢穴，并将其固定在树上。

examination_example.sentence: What inspires the man most in his <highlight>work</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在工作中什么最能激励这个男人？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>work</highlight> on a project
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做一个项目

sense_info_list.en: something created as a result of effort, especially a painting, book, or piece of music

examination_example.sentence: Anneke helps her students get over the fear and create their own animation <highlight>works</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Anneke帮她的学生克服恐惧，创作他们自己的动画作品。

examination_example.sentence: What do the <highlight>works</highlight> by Shepherd and Smith have in common?
examination_example.sentence_trans: Shepherd和Smith的作品有什么共同点？

examination_example.sentence: Currently, about 35,000 <highlight>works</highlight> are being displayed in over 300 rooms in the Louvre, and it would take a lifetime to see everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，大约有35，000件作品正在卢浮宫的300多个房间里展出，想要看完所有的东西需要花一生的时间。

examination_example.sentence: Unlike a normal Parisian apartment, the plumbing (水管) <highlight>worked</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与普通的巴黎公寓不同，这里的水管道很好用。

examination_example.sentence: But I recently came across a study that shows why his approach <highlight>works</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我最近偶然发现了一项研究，解释了为什么他的方法有效。

examination_example.sentence: When it <highlight>works</highlight>, it is simply beautiful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当它发挥作用时，它绝对是极好的。

sense_info_list.en: arrange for something to happen, especially by not using official methods and or by being clever

examination_example.sentence: If you have other daily routines, such as talking on the phone with family, <highlight>work</highlight> those into your day-to-day life before classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你有其他的日常活动，比如与家人打电话，那么把他们安排到你上课之前的日常生活中去。

examination_example.sentence: Go outside and <highlight>work</highlight> out a plan to translate your childhood memories into your grown-up garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走出去，制定一个计划，把你童年的记忆转化成你长大后的花园。

sense_info_list.zh: 运转; 运行; 操作

examination_example.sentence: I'd see how a factory <highlight>worked</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想看看工厂是如何运作的。

examination_example.sentence: I've taken so many Udemy courses, and ifs such a great feeling to get my brain <highlight>working</highlight> again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我学了这么多Udemy课程，如果能让我的大脑重新运转起来，那感觉真好。

examination_example.sentence: Tina hardly drives to <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒂娜几乎不开车上班。

examination_example.sentence: To achieve his dream, he <highlight>worked</highlight> different jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了实现他的梦想，他从事了不同的工作。

examination_example.sentence: Wood is <highlight>working</highlight> with the New World Press.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 伍德正在与新世界出版社合作。

examination_example.sentence: Very talented companies are <highlight>working</highlight> on it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 非常有才华的公司正在进行这项工作。

examination_example.sentence: But he is still <highlight>working</highlight> on rice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他仍在研究大米。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists are <highlight>working</highlight> on them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们正在研究它们。

sense_info_list.en: something created as a result of effort, especially a painting, book, or piece of music

examination_example.sentence: Poor materials also can be made into <highlight>works</highlight> of art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 劣质材料也可以制成艺术品。

examination_example.sentence: teach people to make <highlight>works</highlight> of art
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教人们制作艺术品

examination_example.sentence: Textbooks are like other creative <highlight>works</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教科书就像其他创意作品一样。

examination_example.sentence: Because it may stop <highlight>working</highlight> suddenly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它可能会突然停止工作。

examination_example.sentence: You should use the test button each month to see if the alarm and batteries are still <highlight>working</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该每个月使用测试按钮来查看警报和电池是否仍在工作。

examination_example.sentence: The museum's website even stopped <highlight>working</highlight> for a while.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 博物馆的网站甚至停止运行了一段时间。

examination_example.sentence: The one in my office doesn't <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我办公室的那个（电脑）不工作了。

examination_example.sentence: I also learned that not all great ideas <highlight>work</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还了解到，并非所有伟大的想法都能奏效。

examination_example.sentence: I tried all kinds of things, and nothing <highlight>worked</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我尝试了各种方法，但没有任何效果。

sense_info_list.en: to make efforts to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: Shameem got a position in non-profit organization(非营利性组织) <highlight>working</highlight> to help women in rural(农村的) areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Shameem 在努力帮助农村地区妇女的非营利组织中获得了一个职位。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese people's <highlight>working</highlight> together against the virus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国人民齐心协力抗击病毒。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists are <highlight>working</highlight> to create a less costly technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们正在努力创造一种成本更低的技术。

examination_example.sentence: It is not difficult to <highlight>work</highlight> out the unhappy feelings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 解决不愉快的情绪并不难。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>worked</highlight> out such a difficult math problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他解出了这么难的一道数学题。

examination_example.sentence: Larger volumes of white and grey matter in those parts might lead to better <highlight>working</highlight> memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些部分的大量白质和灰质可能会引发更好的工作记忆。

word_usage.usage:
表示“努力工作”：
如果用名词work，要说hard work，这里的hard是形容词；
如果用动词work，要说work hard，这里的hard是副词。
表达“失业”用out of work，此处work前不可加定冠词the。同样，表达“有工作”用in work，中间也不加the。
work作“著作，作品”时，多用复数形式works。
